q1: How much of a factor do you think the weather was for Nigeria in the past World Cup?
a1: I think the weather is just a small percentage when it comes to the performance of players.
q2: Do you think players from Nigeria train to play in any weather?
a2: Many of the Nigeria's players are playing in Europe so I think they train with their clubs most of the time under different weather conditions.
q3: who is the most famous player from Nigeria
a3: I think Anthony Nwakaeme is pretty famous.
a4: According to their players they have a large percentage of success in winning
